oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-08-24 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 24, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performers Lonzo & Oscar (although George Jones was advertised as the guest for this week on the previous show), and regular performers the Jordanaires, Millie Kirkham, Chubby Wise, Chet Atkins, Rod Brasfield, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 933rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rod Brasfield; Lonzo & Oscar; Del Wood; Hank Snow
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Snow introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Hank Snow) -- Prince Albert commercial (Hank Snow, Grant Turner) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Hank Snow introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- Charming Betsy (Lonzo & Oscar) -- Hank Snow introduces Del Wood -- Are You From Dixie (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner announces Hank Snow's southern tour schedule -- Hank Snow talks -- I Don't Hurt Anymore (Hank Snow) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Kirkham, Millie; Wise, Chubby; Snow, Hank; Lonzo and Oscar
